subSections.title: Alternative forms
subSections.text: * {{l|mul|弁}} (Japanese simplified form which also covers [[辨]] and [[辯]]<!-- and possibly [[辧]]-->)

subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text:
;"segment, section, piece"
:Exopassive of {{och-l|[[辨]]|to divide, distinguish, discriminate}}; possibly in the same word-family as another exopassive {{och-l|[[釆]]|[to cause to be] divided}}. These three thus may be related to either {{och-l|[[班]]|to distribute → to arrange, classify → class, group}} or {{cog|lus|pʰel||to split, cut in halves}} (with medial *{{IPAfont|-r-}} dropped after labial initials according to Mizo phonotactics).

;"petal"
:Either same etymon as "segment, section, piece"; or same etymon as {{och-l|[[葩]]|flower}}; or related to {{och-l|燔|to burn}}, if so, semantically parallel to {{cog|bo|མེ་ཏོག||flower}}, literally "fire-top".

subSections.title: Usage notes
subSections.text: In Japanese {{w|shinjitai}}, 瓣, [[辨]], and [[辯]] have all been simplified to one character, [[弁]].
